About.title: About Nuqta
About.subtitle: Connecting the heart of Istanbul's Arab community.
About.mission_desc: Nuqta is the heartbeat of the Arab community in Istanbul. We are a platform dedicated to bridging cultures, fostering connections, and centralizing the vibrant events and services that make this city home to so many.
About.story_desc: Since our inception, Nuqta has aimed to provide a trusted source for discovering workshops, galleries, bazaars, and community gatherings. We believe that by providing professional tools to organizers and a seamless discovery experience for users, we can help our community thrive together in Istanbul.
About.name_desc: In Arabic, 'Nuqta' (نقطة) means 'point' or 'dot'. We see ourselves as the meeting point — the central dot on the map where everyone comes together to start something new.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.subtitle: We're here to help. Reach out with any questions about the platform or partnership opportunities.
Contact.success_msg: Thank you! We will get back to you soon.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.s1_desc: We collect information you provide directly to us when you create an account, register for an event, or communicate with us. This may include your name, email address, password, and information about the events you organize or attend.
Privacy.s2_desc: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, including to process event registrations, provide customer support, and send you technical notices and security alerts.
Privacy.s3_desc: We do not share your personal information with third parties except as described in this policy, such as when you register for an event and we share necessary details with the event organizer to facilitate your attendance.
Privacy.s4_desc: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time through your account settings or by contacting us directly.
